a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball V

p.k: The Choices / The Code / The Test / The Slide / The Loophole / The Fuss / The News / The Vase / The Ollie Nicole remembers the day she first met Richard, and the different choices she could have made. / When the Wattersons' internet cuts out, they have to adapt to a world without it. / Gumball decides to make some changes when an online personality test tells him that he's "The Loser". / Rocky is trying to find love with the help of the latest dating app… / Gumball and Darwin give Bobert specific instructions to ensure he acts safely. When Bobert starts applying his robot logic to their rules they realise they must be much clearer. / Nicole is angry at Richard for forgetting her special day. / All the breaking stories from the Elmore newsroom. / Nicole encourages Gumball to do what comes naturally...break stuff! / Gumball kind of teaches Darwin how to be a skater…
